A source told the Daily Mirror newspaper: Cheryl Cole 's been straight with Simon Cowell but suddenly people aren't returning her calls. She doesn't want to get into a put-up scrap with Nicole Scherzinger with Simon Cowell playing the puppet master. Although he wants Nicole Scherzinger , Simon Cowell still hasn't made a final decision on the line-up and his stalling is said to be concerning TV chiefs who want the judging panel to be signed off.

In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed!
